text: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَذْهَبَ عَنَّا ٱلْحَزَنَ ۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ

translation.en.sahih: And they will say, "Praise to Allah, who has removed from us [all] sorrow. Indeed, our Lord is Forgiving and Appreciative -
translation.id.indonesian: Dan mereka berkata: "Segala puji bagi Allah yang telah menghilangkan duka cita dari kami. Sesungguhnya Tuhan kami benar-benar Maha Pengampum lagi Maha Mensyukuri.
